table.name: vtiger_onboarding
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_onboarding` ( `onboardingid` int(19) NOT NULL, `onboarding_image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `onboarding_text` text, `onboarding_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`onboardingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_onboardingcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_onboardingcf` ( `onboardingid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`onboardingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
